attributes.action: Ban all cash machines in all arcades
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After being on holiday on the east coast I saw many of these cash machines in family amusements arcades. I saw on many occasions people taking out £100 at a time then going into to the £500 Jackpot area and another arcade offering to cash peoples work cheques. If this is not encouraging gambling I don't know what is.
